trans-unit.source: Represents the evidence used to render an authorization decision for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于呈现的授权决定的证据<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authorized to access a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全令牌使用指定其声明时使用者已获得授权访问特定的资源，可以指定的 SAML 断言。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型和其中一个是一种<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>断言已做出了有关访问指定资源的使用者的授权决定。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: The SamlEvidence class represents the evidence used by a SAML authority to render an authorization decision for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.
trans-unit.target: Samlevidence 既类表示 SAML 授权机构用于呈现<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>的授权决定的证据

trans-unit.source: The evidence is specified as SAML assertions or a reference to SAML assertions, which refer to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该证据指定为 SAML 断言或对 SAML 断言，后者是指引用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref>类使用的 SAML 断言指定的集。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you have a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects, but no SAML assertion references.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，当你有一系列<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>对象，而没有 SAML 断言引用。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> ，它包含 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*>

trans-unit.source: assertions contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: assertions包含的成员 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertion references.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref>类使用指定的 SAML 断言引用集。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you have a collection of SAML assertion references, but no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，当有 SAML 断言引用，而没有集合<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>对象。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains an identifier for a SAML assertion that specifies the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref:System.String>，其中包含指定的 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据的 SAML 断言的标识符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*>

trans-unit.source: assertionIdReferences contains a member that is or empty.
trans-unit.target: assertionIdReferences包含的成员或为空。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref> class using the specified set of SAML assertion references and SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence"></xref>类使用的 SAML 断言引用和 SAML 断言指定的集。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you have a collection of SAML assertion references and a collection of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，当你具有的 SAML 断言引用集合的集合<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>对象。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains an identifier for a SAML assertion that specifies the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref:System.String>，其中包含指定的 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据的 SAML 断言的标识符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> ，它包含 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*> property.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions*>

trans-unit.source: assertionIdReferences contains a member that is or empty.
trans-unit.target: assertionIdReferences包含的成员或为空。

trans-unit.source: -or- assertions contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: -assertions包含的成员 。

trans-unit.source: -or- assertionIdReferences and assertions are both .
trans-unit.target: -or- assertionIdReferences and assertions are both .

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据的 SAML 断言的标识符的集合。

trans-unit.source: The AssertionIdReferences property corresponds to the `\<saml:AssertionIDReference>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: AssertionIdReferences 属性对应于`\<saml:AssertionIDReference>`OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains identifiers for SAML assertions that specify the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>类型的<xref:System.String>，其中包含指定的 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据的 SAML 断言的标识符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of SAML assertions that comprise the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据的 SAML 断言的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property corresponds to the `\<saml:Assertion>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A>属性对应于`\<saml:Assertion>`OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 规范中的断言和协议定义的元素。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"></xref> that contains the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion"> </xref> ，它包含 SAML 授权机构呈现授权决定时所依赖的证据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此实例的属性是否是只读的。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使此实例的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence>类只读的调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此实例的属性是只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 MakeReadOnly 方法时，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A>属性设置为`true`和能不能再设置此实例的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the evidence from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 XML 读取器读取证据。

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A>
trans-unit.target: ReadXml 方法会设置以下属性:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.Assertions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the evidence.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>用于读取证据。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够读取 SAML 规范中定义的 SAML 授权语句中的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>的数字签名的子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> ，确定创建了数字签名的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: reader refers to an XML element that does not have at least one or child element.
trans-unit.target: reader引用不具有至少一个 XML 元素或子元素。

trans-unit.source: Writes the evidence into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 将证据写入指定的 XML 序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence> instance into a `<saml:Evidence>` element.
trans-unit.target: WriteXml 方法用于编写当前<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence>实例`<saml:Evidence>`元素。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the evidence.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>用于写入证据。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入 SAML 断言中的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> ，它能够写入<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句。

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .
